channel.title: Making ADmins
channel.description:
Im facing this annoying problem, I cant make a admin or mod, I dont know if im doing it correctly but i go into characters and click on the person i want to make a admin, then add a 3 next to playerrights, When i do this, It says all this crapAFter i make my guy a admin, and then log onto my server it says this stuff
[img]http://img147.imageshack.us/img147/7113/ciientjk5.png[/img]
HEres another picture [img]http://img83.imageshack.us/img83/431/client2ho8.png[/img]
What am i doing wrong!! Thx for your support on this matter and i cant thank you enough if you help me!

item.title: Making ADmins
item.dc:creator: @Marz Marz
item.description:
@Marz wrote:

Me either, yes what source? If you’re a beginner give testscape a try found here and then log in to your account, wait until it writes your ‘username.txt’ then go into your file and look for Player Rights = 0 and change the 0 to 3 for Owner Rights

Read full topic
